text: George II (, Geórgios II; 19 July [O.S: 7 July] 1890 – 1 April 1947) was King of Greece from September 1922 to March 1924 and from November 1935 to his death in April 1947. He was the oldest son of King Constantine I and Sophia of Prussia. He died of arteriosclerosis in April 1947 at the age of 56. Having no children, he was succeeded by his younger brother, Paul. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Kings of Greece Category:Deaths from arteriosclerosis
title: George II of Greece
